content:
Set Up an Entitlement Template

Entitlement templates let you predefine terms of support that users can add to products.

Available in both: Salesforce Classic and Lightning Experience
Available in: Professional, Enterprise, Performance, Unlimited, and Developer Editions with the Service Cloud


To create entitlement templates:	Manage Entitlements

You can create entitlement templates for specific products so support agents can quickly add the right entitlement whenever a customer purchases the product.

Entitlement templates are only available if entitlements and products are enabled in your org.

Add the Entitlement Templates related list to product page layouts.
Optionally, add the Type and Business Hours fields to the Entitlement Templates related list.

Create an entitlement template.
Enter:
* Entitlement Template Name
* Term (Days)
* Entitlement Process
* Per Incident (optional)
* Cases Per Entitlement (if Per Incident is selected)
* Business Hours
* Type

Click Save.

Add the entitlement template to a product.
Select the entitlement template on the Entitlement Templates related list and click Insert Selected.

Now when a user creates an asset and links it to that product, the Entitlements related list on the asset includes an entitlement created from the entitlement template.
title: Setting Up Entitlement Templates in Service Cloud
